Uses of Class
nodebasis.Node

  • Packages that use Node 
    Package Description
    nodebasis  
    surrounding  

    • Uses of Node in nodebasis

      Methods in nodebasis that return Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node Event.getNode()
      Returns the node where the event occurred.
      Node ImplicitEvent.getNode()
      Gets the node which knows the way to the event.
      Methods in nodebasis with parameters of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ImplicitEvent.setNode(Node node)
      Sets a new node which knows the way to the event.
      Constructors in nodebasis with parameters of type Node 
      Constructor and Description
      AgentMessage(Node node, int messageLife, int time)
      Creates an AgentMessage object with the the amount of lives it should have.
      Event(int id, int time, Node node)
      Creates an Event object with the id of the event, the time which the event occurred and the originating node.
      ImplicitEvent(int id, int distance, Node node)
      Creates an ImplicitEvent object with attributes resembling a real event.
      RequestMessage(int addressedTo, int messageLife, int timeOfCreation, Node originatingNode)
      Creates a RequestMessage object with the id to the sought event, the amount of lives this message should possess, the time of its creation, and the origin node as a reference.

    • Uses of Node in surrounding

      Methods in surrounding that return types with arguments of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap<Position,Node> StandardNodeNetworkGenerator.generate()
      Generates the node network and returns it in a HashMap.
      java.util.HashMap<Position,Node> SimTestNodeNetworkGenerator.generate() 
      java.util.HashMap<Position,Node> NodeNetworkGenerator.generate() 
      java.util.HashMap<Position,Node> FileNodeNetworkGenerator.generate() 
      java.util.ArrayList<Node> Field.getNodesWithinRangeofNode(Node nodeAtCentrum)
      This operation is somewhat expensive, and if possible should be used before the start of the simulation.

      By giving the method a node it will find all nodes within the range of the specified node, and return an ArrayList containing all of the found nodes.
      Methods in surrounding with parameters of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Node> Field.getNodesWithinRangeofNode(Node nodeAtCentrum)
      This operation is somewhat expensive, and if possible should be used before the start of the simulation.

      By giving the method a node it will find all nodes within the range of the specified node, and return an ArrayList containing all of the found nodes.
      Method parameters in surrounding with type arguments of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Field.loadNodeNetwork(java.util.HashMap<Position,Node> nodeMap)
      This method must be called with an instantiated HashMap containing the node network, before the simulation can be started.
